title: Katarina Framerate Bug
body:
So since the new assassin nerfs are out I decided to try out katarina, and was faced with a mirror lane.
But the second the knives started flying out my so did my frames. 
Every time a katarina q, w, or r would happen my game would either freeze, or drop to 2fps for 3 seconds.
It sure as heck isn't my rig since I usually run the game at 200+ fps. 
I'm going to try and repair my client to see if that fixes it. Anyone else get this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you may have a corrupted asset relating to katarina, a repair should definitely help you out.

Let me know how you go.
